entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text: @realDonaldTrump Why don’t you concentrate about the Coronavirus instead?Are you finally thinking it’s not a hoax or the Democrats’ fault? You and Pence are not equipped to handle what needs to be done. You know who can? Joe Biden. He’s not sleepy; he’s coming for your job. Buh bye Trumpy Trump.
